value:
I recognize so few people here...
Where are Ogma...and Barst?

Talys is made of many small islands.
We all banded together to protect
each other from pirate brigands.

Here, I brought you a nice hot drink.
Why don't you take a break.

When my father united Talys, there
was a fierce commander from Grust
who fought at his side.

Talys is surrounded by water on all
sides, so attack can come from any
direction at any time.$k$pWe do not know the luxury of resting
on our laurels.

What a lovely castle this is... You are
$Nu, are you not?

My hope is for the world to become
a kinder place.

I am not a child anymore. I can
fight my own battles just fine.
But...why?
Ooh! Thank you! I'll try my best!

My name is Caeda, and I come from
Talys. I may have my fair share to
learn, but I will put in the work!

I wonder, is there anyone you fight
for? Someone you...love, I mean?$k$pMy father would say a warrior is
only as strong as the love they
have for those they fight to defend.$k$pI'm not sure I fully understand yet
what he meant. But I do know I want
peace...for everyone.$k$pNot just Talys! The whole world...
We could all just decide to be kind.
But that, too, takes a certain strength.$k$pSo for now I only hope more will
consider training their kindness
alongside building their strength.
はいっ！
えいっ！
きゃああっ！
I won't lose...
No more fighting!
Leave me alone!
I am not a child!
I don't want to hurt you!
Please, no...
giggle
Hello. I am Caeda. It's nice to meet you.
Oh! Were you trying to scare me?
On the island where I grew up, the people were few but happy.
Do you believe in love?
The world that lies beyond the shores of Talys is so unfamiliar to me…
I wonder if I'll get married someday.
You are a kind person. Thank you for lending me your ear.
I'm ready.
What to do...
Let's.
